borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: Once installed, the bin storage facility as shown on the approved plans shall thereafter be retained and kept available for use as a bin store by the residents at all times.

The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

Design and Access Statement - sDNA/293/DAS 01 rev C - March 2022

Location Plan - sDNA/296/100 rev - - 02/07/2015

Proposed Site Plan - sDNA/293/201 rev D - 28/07/2015

Plan and Elevations - sDNA/293/202 rev C - 14/04/2015

No other drawings or documents apply.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Construction of a new central refuse store building to replace existing bin stores areas within Hewett's Quay housing development
